Title: Directs the commissioner of agriculture and markets to reform certain grant programs to promote opportunities for multi-generational farming families and for beginning farmers
Summary: Directs the commissioner of agriculture and markets to reform certain grant programs to promote opportunities for multi-generational farming families and for beginning farmers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the directing the commissioner of agriculture and markets to reform certain grant programs to promote opportunities for multi-generational farming families and for beginning farmers
